summary.para: Adds a file to the list of the files stored in memory. Stored data (bitmap, text, raw data) will be copied into private memory stream and available in WebBrowser under name "memory:" + filename. Before using memory file system, you need to initialize it with Init("memory").
If you know MIME type of the file, use method overload with mimetype parameter, because it makes accessing the files faster.

AddFile.param: Specifies name of the file in the memory file system.
Specifies pointer to the file's raw data.
Specifies stream with the file data.
Specifies string with text file data.
Specifies filename on the hard drive to read data from.
